name: Prison Transporter Police Driver
description:
Prison Transporter Police Driver

Police Prisoners Transporter is a bus driver simulator that allows you to experience the rush in the life of a prison police bus driver who has the duties of reaching the crime scenes, capture the criminals and transport them to the police station.

You have to be a great driver, do you think you can control a heavy police bus in difficult hills climb roads, do you think you can drive a bus with criminals,robbers,thief,and take them safely at policestation.

Pick and drop police cops to maintain peaceful city environment.Give the criminals a thrilling ride. Leave no avenue of escape!

Drive the police bus, follow the police officer instructions and fulfill your duty as the prisoners transporter bus driver.

Key features:

=> Real Prisoners security
=> police bus transport experience in a crime city environment
=> Smooth Bus Driving Controls
=> Superb 3D graphics
=> Amazing bus simulation experience
